short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent showing recent search results popup after clearing the search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube automatically shows a popup with recent search suggestions after you click the "clear search" button in the search bar.

This Chrome extension prevents the recent search suggestions popup from appearing when the "clear search" button is clicked.
